mainText:
Since I was a kid, playing on my friend's Apple II, through the Mac Plus that got me through college, to my iPods, iMacs, MacBooks, iPads, every single one of them felt like more than just a piece of cold plastic, metal and glass.  It was the inspiration of Steve and the work of the people he inspired that made all of these cherished possessions.  Thank you Steve, for making the
 everyday extraordinary.
author: Craig
